author: wn.com
title: Pitman to step down as dean of UB College of Arts and Sciences (University at ...
text: ( Source : University at Buffalo , State University of New York ) BUFFALO, N.Y. -- E. Bruce Pitman is stepping down as dean of the University at Buffalo College of Arts and Sciences ( CAS ), effective July 1, after a successful five-year tenure
